title: IS_CONTROL_PRESSED
content:
0xF3A21BCD95725A4A0x517A4384// IsControlPressed
BOOL IS_CONTROL_PRESSED(int padIndex, int control);Parameters:padIndex: The control system instance to use. See ENABLE_ALL_CONTROL_ACTIONS.control: The control ID to check.Returns: True if the control was pressed.Returns whether a control is currently pressed.
codeBlocks:
// IsControlPressed
BOOL IS_CONTROL_PRESSED(int padIndex, int control);
